function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reporting biases and incomplete coverage of testing approaches","Impact":"Underestimation of COVID-19 spread and risk","Mitigation":"Implement random testing and standardized reporting guidelines","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying reporting biases","People":"Public health organizations, government bodies","Owner":"Public health organizations, government bodies"},{"Description":"Factors such as health infrastructure, socioeconomic background, and health supplies affecting the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Unequal spread of COVID-19 and higher risk in vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Investment in health infrastructure, targeted support for vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure development, targeted intervention programs","People":"Vulnerable communities, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inability to assess seasonal patterns and mutated versions of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Limited understanding of future infection trends and potential impact of mutations","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring of virus mutations and global collaboration for data sharing","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, global data sharing platforms","People":"Research institutions, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, global health organizations"}]}
